overview:
Preston Rutherford is the Director of Partnerships at Cooliris, a Kleiner Perkins Caufield and Byers funded startup.

Cooliris has a history of creating products that further the media discovery, navigation, consumption, and sharing experiences. They started with the Cooliris browser extension, a new way to browse photos and videos on your desktop, with over 35m downloads to date. They followed it up by building the Gallery application that comes pre-bundled on Android phones, and recently produced what was the iPad #1 app, named Discover. As Cooliris evolves, theyâ€™re applying this expertise to do two things: change the way people share media and communicate on mobile devices with their new social communication service called LiveShare, and revolutionize the mobile monetization experience with truly Immersive, 3D mobile ads products.
